mapper.select: SELECT orderNo, reviewtext, score FROM Review WHERE orderNo = (SELECT orderNo FROM Orders o, Auction a WHERE o.auctionNo = a.auctionNo)
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT Review.orderNo) FROM Review WHERE userNo = #{userNo} AND isDelete = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Review (orderNo, userNo, reviewtext, score) VALUES (#{orderNo}, #{userNo}, #{content}, #{score})
